items.title: Monarch butterflies could disappear. Butterfly Town USA is scrambling to save them
bullets: • Pacific Grove, California, has long been an official “overwintering” resting site for monarch butterflies
• Monarch populations in the western US have plummeted by more than 99% since the 1980s
• Experts fear the western monarchs have a nearly 100% chance of extinction by 2080

bullets: • In 2025 a total of 63 sets were released in the Black Series, which contained a total number of 77 figures

• We still get more sets now than we even got during the sequel trilogy years

• It seems to be one of the earliest major shifts in the evolutionary path that eventually led to us, modern humans
